description: This file is a header (.h) file defining the interface for MeshAgent configuration and management within a software project. It declares function prototypes for getting and setting various parameters related to MeshAgent, OVS, and GreAcc, as well as validation, commit, and rollback operations. The file also includes several external headers and references a message array, suggesting its role in managing or interfacing with MeshAgent components.

methods.name: CosaDmlServiceManagerInit
methods.description: Initializes the service manager for the MeshAgent component.

methods.name: MeshAgent_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for the MeshAgent.

methods.name: OVS_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for OVS.

methods.name: GreAcc_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for GreAcc.

methods.name: MeshAgent_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for MeshAgent.

methods.name: MeshAgent_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value for MeshAgent.

methods.name: MeshAgent_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets an unsigned long parameter value for MeshAgent.

methods.name: MeshAgent_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for MeshAgent.

methods.name: OVS_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for OVS.

methods.name: GreAcc_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for GreAcc.

methods.name: MeshAgent_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for MeshAgent.

methods.name: MeshAgent_Validate
methods.description: Validates the parameters for MeshAgent before commit.

methods.name: MeshAgent_Commit
methods.description: Commits the parameters changes for MeshAgent.

methods.name: MeshAgent_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back the parameter changes for MeshAgent.
